awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 nomination.

fullplot: Harris, J, and George decide to take a holiday boating up the Thames to Oxford. Battling against Hampton Court maze, tents, rain, locks, and Henley Regatta the accident-prone threesome have one success anyway - they meet Sophie, Primrose and Bluebell.
plot: Three London gentlemen take vacation rowing down the Thames, encountering various mishaps and misadventures along the way.
title: Three Men in a Boat
